isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR CHECK BRACKET

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Check Bracket on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 1) and remove two torx head bolts (Item 2) to remove the front cab door check bracket (Item 3) from the cab hinge pillar (Item 4), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 49. Front Cab Door Check Bracket

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door check bracket.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Crew Cab Rear Door Check Bracket on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 50 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 1) and remove two torx head bolts (Item 2) to remove the crew cab rear door check bracket (Item 3) from the crew cab B pillar (Item 4), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 50. Crew Cab Rear Door Check Bracket

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. CREW CAB REAR DOOR CHECK BRACKET

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side crew cab rear door check bracket.
